the main disadvantage of such attacks tempest attacks is that they are limited at recovering speech only from virtual

into two categories so the first categories is the first category is internal methods and the
second category is external methods we are going to first discuss internal methods
so internal methods are methods that rely on data obtained by a device located in proximity to the victim
in other words in the same room with the victim and in recent years we've seen
scientists exploit motion sensors speakers vibration sensor vibration sensors which
are all integrated into smartphones and to eavesdrop on sound using data

the biggest disadvantage is that they require the attacker to place a compromised device near the victim to

the victim so the most famous external method that we know
today is the laser microphone which uses a laser transceiver to

the sound laser microphone's biggest advantages is that first of all it's external
and which means it does not require any to place any malware near the victim
and second of second of all it can be applied in real time however this method is active which
